subject: Introducing myself
author: Carol B.
full_text:
Hello all,

My name is Carol and I've been an investigator for 10+ years.  I'm new to
the Frank's box device, and am totally fascinated by it!  My husband works
in recording studios and is willing to build me my first box.  I would
like to work with the RS hack too. I've got many great class a evp's from
my dvr...but I'm really looking forwards to working with Frank's Box. 
Glad to meet y'all.

Carol B.
